metadata.title: CVE-2024-26930 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:qla2xxx: Fix double free of the ha->vp_map pointer Coverity scan reportedpotential risk of double free of the pointer ha->vp_map. ha->vp_map wasfreed in qla2x00_mem_alloc(), and again freed in functionqla2x00_mem_free(ha). Assign NULL to vp_map and kfree take care of NULL.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
